title: Drawing, Design for a Gilded Silver Bowl or Plate, 1550–83
title_raw: Design for a Gilded Silver Bowl or Plate
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk with inscribed compass lines on off-white laid paper laid down
inscribed:
Upper right corner in graphite: 29
Verso, lower right corner above repair in graphite: A19853
Verso, upper right corner in black chalk 60 [?] and a slight sketch of a geometric pattern below
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Design for a circular bowl or plate decorated with ovals, framed with woven, scaled and facetted bands and beading

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Gilded Silver Bowl or Plate, 1550–83. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk with inscribed compass lines on off-white laid paper laid down. 
Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1993-8-1
